entry.title: Tymogen | 20mg/2ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: PEN PEPTIDE
Type: Peptide Bioregulator Tymogen
Price: 79.00

All products are shipped in a cooled box at the appropriate temperature.

What is Tymogen?

Tymogen is a peptide bioregulator that plays a key role in modulating the immune system and maintaining immune balance in the human body. It is found in the thymus gland, which is a central organ for the development of the immune system, especially in young organisms. Tymogen is crucial in the differentiation and activation of T-lymphocytes, which are an essential component of the adaptive immune system.

What are the benefits of Tymogen?

Tymogen is a peptide bioregulator with significant applications in immunology, offering promising health and well-being benefits. Here are some of the key benefits of this peptide:

  • Strengthening the immune system: Tymogen is instrumental in stimulating the immune system, aiding in the development and functioning of T-lymphocytes. This leads to strengthening the body's ability to cope with viral and bacterial infections, thereby increasing the overall resistance of the body to various diseases.
  • Modulating inflammatory processes: This peptide has the ability to modulate inflammatory responses in the body, making it potentially useful in managing chronic inflammatory conditions such as rheumatoid arthritis, inflammatory bowel diseases, and other autoimmune disorders.
  • Aiding recovery after illnesses: Thanks to its ability to stimulate the immune system, Tymogen can accelerate recovery after various diseases, reducing the duration of illness and improving the general condition of the patient.
  • Potential in treating autoimmune diseases: The peptide's ability to modulate the immune system suggests that it may be useful in treatment strategies for some autoimmune diseases, helping to restore immune balance and reduce autoimmune activity.

Possible side effects of Tymogen:

Typically, it is well tolerated by patients and side effects are rare. Here are some of the potential side effects that may occur with the use of Tymogen:

  • Local reactions at the injection site: For forms of Tymogen that are administered through injections, local reactions such as redness, swelling, pain, or itching at the injection site may occur.
  • These symptoms are usually temporary and disappear without the need for special treatment. Feeling of fatigue or slight discomfort: Some people may experience mild fatigue, weakness, or general discomfort after taking Tymogen.
  • These symptoms are usually transient and subside on their own. Headache: It is possible to experience mild headaches after the application of Tymogen, which are also usually temporary and manageable with common pain relief methods.

Proper intake and dosage of Tymogen:

    The dosage and method of taking Tymogen depend on many factors, including the purpose of intake, individual needs, and the health condition of the person.

    Typically, the intake is from 1mg. to 2mg. daily (from 10 to 20 units), considering that one unit corresponds to 100 micrograms. The duration of the cycle is usually 10 days. Another intake option for active infections: Take 5mg. per day for a period of 3 to 5 days.

    Why choose Pen Peptide?

    If you're looking for the highest quality Tymogen peptide with over 99% purity, dtspharmacy.com is one of the best places to order online. Pen Peptide is a brand specializing in synthesizing highly purified peptides, produced for scientific research and development. We provide peptides manufactured in quality laboratories.

entry.title: Chonluten | (Glu-Asp-Gly) | 20mg/2ml
entry.summary:

Price: 79.00

What is Chonluten (Glu-Asp-Gly)?

Chonluten (Glu-Asp-Gly) is a peptide bioregulator formula created to support and enhance the function of cartilage tissue in the body. It consists of three amino acids - glutamic acid (Glu), aspartic acid (Asp), and glycine (Gly), which play a key role in the body.

The amino acids that form the basis of Chonluten are part of the natural biochemical process of collagen synthesis in the body. Collagen is the main protein in cartilage tissue and is crucial for maintaining healthy and elastic cartilage tissue.

Chonluten is a bioregulator, which means it helps regulate and stabilize the body's functions rather than providing external ingredients. As such, it works by assisting the body in self-regulation and self-management, supporting the body's natural mechanisms for maintaining and repairing cartilage tissue..

What are the benefits of Chonluten (Glu-Asp-Gly)?

Chonluten is a bioregulator, which means it helps regulate and stabilize the body's functions rather than providing external ingredients. The benefits of taking this peptide are:

  • Improvement of Cartilage Tissue Function: Chonluten peptide supports the natural function and structure of cartilage by aiding in the maintenance of normal collagen synthesis.
  • Support for Healthy Joints: Due to its support for cartilage tissue, the bioregulator Chonluten may contribute to maintaining healthy and functional joints.
  • Enhancement of Mobility: By supporting healthy joints, Chonluten can help ease movement and increase flexibility in the body.
  • Reduction of Joint Pain: By promoting cartilage health, the Chonluten bioregulator may reduce or prevent joint pain associated with wear and tear.
  • Tissue Regeneration Support: Chonluten enhances the body's ability to recover and regenerate cartilage tissue.
  • Prevention of Joint Aging: Chonluten may help slow down the aging process of joints by maintaining healthy and strong cartilage.
  • Improvement of Overall Health and Well-being: Maintaining healthy joints and cartilage can contribute to overall health and well-being, enabling greater mobility and an active lifestyle.
  • Assistance with Arthritis: Chonluten can be beneficial in alleviating arthritis symptoms, reducing pain, and improving joint function.

Possible side effects of Chonluten (Glu-Asp-Gly):

There is no information available regarding negative side effects.

Correct dosage and administration of Chonluten (Glu-Asp-Gly):

The recommended dosage for this peptide is 20 units per day (2mg). One pen provides enough for 10 doses or 10 days.

What other peptides can be combined with Chonluten (Glu-Asp-Gly) | 20mg/2ml?

Chonluten, a peptide bioregulator, supports cartilage tissue health by aiding in collagen synthesis and promoting the body's natural self-regulation. To enhance its effects, consider combining it with the following peptides:

  1. BPC-157: This peptide accelerates healing and tissue repair, making it an ideal partner for Chonluten in supporting cartilage regeneration and reducing inflammation.
  2. TB-500 (Thymosin Beta-4): Known for its tissue repair and anti-inflammatory properties, TB-500 can synergize with Chonluten to enhance collagen production and support joint mobility.
  3. GHK-Cu: This peptide promotes collagen synthesis, tissue repair, and anti-inflammatory responses, amplifying Chonluten’s role in maintaining healthy cartilage and connective tissue.
  4. Epithalon: As a bioregulator that supports cellular repair and regeneration, Epithalon can complement Chonluten in enhancing the body’s natural mechanisms for cartilage stabilization and recovery.
  5. CJC-1295: By boosting growth hormone production, this peptide can aid Chonluten’s effects by promoting overall tissue repair and resilience, including in cartilage.

These combinations align with Chonluten’s natural approach to regulating and supporting the body’s cartilage tissue health, offering a holistic strategy for maintaining joint function and mobility. Always consult a healthcare professional to tailor a peptide regimen to your specific needs.

This is only a partial list of peptides that can be combined with Chonluten.

What is Vesugen Peptide (Lys-Glu-Asp)?

Vesugen peptide (Lys-Glu-Asp) is a bioregulating peptide designed to support and stimulate the function of the vascular system. This peptide is part of a larger group of biologically active substances known as bioregulatory peptides, consisting of short sequences of amino acids.

Vesugen peptide (Lys-Glu-Asp) is specifically designed to support the vascular system, including blood vessels and the heart. Research indicates that the bioregulator Vesugen peptide may improve circulation and reduce the risk of cardiovascular diseases such as ischemic heart disease, hypertension, and atherosclerosis. Many of these conditions are directly linked to obstructions or damage to blood vessels, so supporting the vascular system can lead to significant health benefits.

Vesugen peptide operates by encouraging the regulation and balance of physiological processes in the body, enhancing the functioning of the vascular system. It can stimulate the production of new vessels (angiogenesis), improve the elasticity of vessels, and reduce the inflammatory process associated with vascular diseases.

Like other bioregulatory peptides, Vesugen is well tolerated by the body since it consists of amino acids, which are a natural part of our bodies. However, like any medicinal product, it is recommended that Vesugen be used as directed by a specialist.

The bioregulator Vesugen (Lys-Glu-Asp) is characterized by numerous health benefits stemming from its unique ability to stimulate and maintain the function of the vascular system. Here are some of the key benefits that Vesugen can offer:

  • Vesugen peptide stimulates normal blood circulation, aiding the “delivery” of oxygen and nutrients to all organs and tissues in the body.
  • This peptide helps improve the elasticity of blood vessels, potentially reducing the risk of vascular obstructions and complications.
  • Peptide Vesugen contributes to reducing the risk of cardiovascular diseases such as ischemic heart disease, hypertension, and atherosclerosis.
  • Vesugen can stimulate angiogenesis, or the formation of new vessels, which may help improve circulation and tissue regeneration.
  • Peptide Vesugen aids in reducing inflammation in the vascular system, which may prevent or slow the progression of vascular diseases.
  • By improving circulation and vascular function, Vesugen can support the overall health of the heart.
  • Enhanced circulation through the use of peptide Vesugen may lead to a more effective "delivery" of oxygen and nutrients to cells, potentially leading to increased energy levels.
  • Vesugen peptide may aid in maintaining healthy aging by preventing or delaying the onset of age-related diseases and conditions such as cardiovascular diseases.

There is no data on negative side effects.

Proper intake and dosage of Vesugen (Lys-Glu-Asp):

What is Vilon (Lys-Glu)?

(Lys-Glu) is a peptide bioregulator composed of two amino acids - lysine (Lys) and glutamic acid (Glu). This bioregulatory peptide is recognized for its ability to interact specifically with the cells of the thymus, a primary organ in the immune system.

Vilon is part of the extensive classification of substances known as peptide bioregulators. These compounds are widely utilized in biomedicine due to their capability to influence various cellular processes. Peptide bioregulators function as "keys" that "unlock" specific functions in target cells, making them highly specific in their action and allowing them to affect distinct processes within the body.

The Vilon Bioregulator is of particular interest as it interacts specifically with the thymus. The thymus is an organ that plays a crucial role in the immune system since it is where T-cells (an important type of white blood cell) mature and develop.

The Vilon peptide operates by interacting with thymus cells, aiding certain functions and processes within this organ. While more research is needed to precisely determine all its mechanisms of action, Vilon has already become a topic of significant interest in the scientific community due to its potential to influence the immune system.

Vilon (Lys-Glu) represents an essential tool in the realm of bioregulation and holds significant potential for application in both science and medicine.

Pancragen (Lys-Glu-Asp-Trp) is a bioregulator representing a synthetic tetrapeptide based on the amino acid sequence of Lysine (Lys), Glutamic Acid (Glu), Aspartic Acid (Asp), and Tryptophan (Trp). Bioregulators, also known as cytomeds, are used in bioregulative medicine and biotechnologies to improve the functions of specific organs or systems in the body.

Synthesized using the "thin layer" method in polypeptide synthesizers, these peptides are designed to mimic the natural bioregulatory processes that occur in the body. They work as "keys," activating or deactivating specific cellular functions and stimulating the body to restore its balanced activity.

Pancragen, composed of the amino acids lysine, glutamic acid, aspartic acid, and tryptophan, is aimed at supporting the pancreas. It seeks to stimulate the natural function of the pancreas by assisting its ability to produce the necessary hormones and enzymes related to blood sugar regulation and digestion.

What is Cartalax (Ala-Glu-Asp)?

Cartalax (Ala-Glu-Asp) is a specific peptide bioregulatory formula created to enhance joint health and function. Bioregulators are small protein molecules that assist in stimulating and regulating various biological processes in the body.

Cartalax is specialized in supporting the nutritional needs of the cartilage tissue in the joints. It is designed with the specific purpose of helping maintain joint stability and flexibility while also promoting the regeneration of cartilage tissue.

Its formula includes three amino acids - alanine (Ala), glutamine (Glu), and aspartic acid (Asp). These amino acids play a crucial role in supporting cartilage tissue and overall joint health.

The specific combination of these amino acids can aid in various aspects of joint health, including pain relief, improved mobility, and the stimulation of cartilage tissue regeneration.

However, even though Cartalax is designed to enhance joint health, it is important to consult with a specialist before starting regular intake of this peptide to ensure it is suitable for you.

What are the benefits of Cartalax (Ala-Glu-Asp)?

Cartalax (Ala-Glu-Asp) offers a range of potential benefits associated with improving joint health and function. Here are some possible advantages of taking Cartalax:

  • Enhances Joint Stability: Cartalax can help maintain joint stability by supporting the health of cartilage tissue.
  • Supports Cartilage Regeneration: The amino acids found in Cartalax may stimulate the processes of regeneration in cartilage tissue.
  • Improves Joint Flexibility: Regular intake of Cartalax peptide may improve joint flexibility and enhance mobility.
  • Alleviates Joint Pain: Cartalax peptide may aid in relieving joint pain often associated with conditions like osteoarthritis.

  • Supports Recovery After Injuries: Cartalax can assist in the recovery of joints following injuries, facilitating rapid and effective regeneration of cartilage tissue.
  • Protects Joints During Physical Activity: The bioregulator Cartalax may protect joints from wear and tear and injuries related to sports and other forms of physical activity, supporting the health of cartilage tissue.

There is no data indicating negative side effects.

Crystagen is known for aiding in the stimulation of the immune system and the effectiveness of the body's natural protective functions. It helps the body cope with various forms of stress, including bacterial and viral infections, as well as stressful situations.

entry.title: Cortagen | Ala-Glu-Asp-Pro | 20mg/2ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: PEN PEPTIDE
Type: bioregulator peptide cortagen
Price: 79.00

All products are shipped in a cooler box at an appropriate temperature.

What is Cortagen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Pro)?

Cortagen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Pro) is a dietary supplement based on peptide technology. This product is composed of four amino acids: alanine (Ala), glutamine (Glu), asparagine (Asp), and proline (Pro), which are uniquely combined. The amino acids in Cortagen come together to form a peptide that mimics natural processes in the body. This combination is designed to support the adrenal glands and assist in the regulation of cortisol levels in the body.

The choice of specific amino acids in the Cortagen formula is aimed at improving specific functions in the body. For example, alanine plays a key role in glucose formation, glutamine is the primary energy source for immune cells, asparagine participates in amino acid biosynthesis, and proline is a key component of collagen and is important for maintaining healthy skin and connective tissues.

Cortagen is intended for supplemental intake alongside a balanced diet and should not replace a healthy lifestyle. For optimal results, the product should be taken after consultation with a specialist.

What are the benefits of Cortagen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Pro)?

Cortagen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Pro) is a dietary supplement designed to support the adrenal glands and assist in the regulation of cortisol levels in the body. The benefits of taking this peptide are:

  • Support for the adrenal glands: The ingredients in Cortagen can help support the functions of the adrenal glands, which are responsible for the production of cortisol—a hormone that controls the body's stress response.
  • Stress Management: Cortagen helps in regulating cortisol levels, which can assist the body in dealing with stress and improving overall health.
  • Immune System Support: Glutamine, an ingredient in Cortagen, is known for its immunostimulatory properties and can help strengthen the immune system.
  • Metabolism Support: Alanine in Cortagen participates in the process of gluconeogenesis, which helps the body produce glucose and energy.
  • Skin Health Maintenance: Proline is a key ingredient in collagen and is important for maintaining the elasticity and strength of the skin.
  • Liver Health Improvement: The inclusion of asparagine in Cortagen's composition helps maintain liver functions.
  • Maintaining Healthy Connective Tissues: Proline, a key component in collagen, can assist in maintaining healthy connective tissues, including joints, tendons, and ligaments.
  • Energy Metabolism Support: The amino acids in Cortagen, especially alanine and glutamine, assist energy metabolism by providing an energy source for various cells and tissues.

Potential side effects of cortagen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Pro):

There are no data on negative side effects.

Proper intake and dosage of Cortagen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Pro):

The recommended intake of this peptide is: 20 units per day (2mg). One pen is enough for 10 doses or 10 days.

What other peptides can be combined with Cortagen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Pro)?

Cortagen, a peptide dietary supplement designed to support adrenal gland function and regulate cortisol levels, can be combined with other peptides for enhanced overall benefits. Here are some potential synergistic combinations:

  1. GHK-Cu: A peptide that supports tissue repair, immune function, and skin health, GHK-Cu can enhance Cortagen’s effects on connective tissues and overall vitality.
  2. Selank: Known for its anxiolytic properties, Selank can complement Cortagen by addressing stress and anxiety, providing additional support for cortisol regulation.

These combinations can amplify Cortagen’s role in promoting adrenal health and maintaining stress balance. Always consult with a healthcare professional to determine the best peptide regimen for your needs.

Why choose Pen Peptide?

What is Bronchogen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Leu)?

Bronchogen (Ala-Glu-Asp-Leu) is a specific bioactive peptide designed to support and optimize the health of the respiratory system. It consists of a combination of four amino acids - Alanine (Ala), Glutamine (Glu), Asparagine (Asp), and Leucine (Leu), which are linked together in a specific sequence to create a unique peptide product.

Alanine and Leucine are fundamental building blocks of proteins and play essential roles in the body's functioning. Glutamine and Asparagine are amino acids that contribute to the proper functioning of various biological processes, including the immune and nervous systems.

Peptides like Bronchogen are typically produced synthetically and are intended for specific purposes, which may include supporting specific organs or systems in the body. In the case of Bronchogen, the goal is to support the respiratory system and improve the overall health of the respiratory pathways.

It's important to note that while Bronchogen is intended to support respiratory health, it should not be used as a substitute for medical therapy or as the sole means of treating respiratory diseases.
